name: mcp-installer
description: This server is a server that installs other MCP servers for you.

examples.title: Install MCP server
examples.description: Install the MCP server named mcp-server-fetch
examples.prompt: Hey Claude, install the MCP server named mcp-server-fetch

examples.title: Install server with arguments
examples.description: Install the @modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem package as an MCP server with specific arguments
examples.prompt: Hey Claude, install the @modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem package as an MCP server. Use ['/Users/anibetts/Desktop'] for the arguments

examples.title: Install from directory
examples.description: Install the MCP server from a specific directory
examples.prompt: Hi Claude, please install the MCP server at /Users/anibetts/code/mcp-youtube, I'm too lazy to do it myself.

examples.title: Set environment variable
examples.description: Install the server @modelcontextprotocol/server-github with an environment variable
examples.prompt: Install the server @modelcontextprotocol/server-github. Set the environment variable GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN to '1234567890'
